438050.name: Downfall Demo
438050.description:
Venture into Quiet Haven Hotel and its surrounds with Joe and Agnes in this short demo of Downfall.

This short playable demo will give you a glimpse of what is to be expected & found in the full game!

Downfall is a brand new horror adventure game by Harvester Games, based on their original 2009 game and remade in similar style to The Cat Lady for 2016. It features original music by micAmic, other featured artists and full English voice acting. Have even more fun with a Steam copy which includes achievements and trading cards!
438050.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
